name: Our Galaxy
description:
Our Galaxy is a short game made in one week for the Lost Relic Games Game Jam!

It is one of my first games I've ever built and completed.

It is about two aliens in love who want to connect with each other and reunite in a galaxy unknown. Help them find their way as you control them both at the same time in different worlds as you blaze the trail to the gateway to another galaxy!

I know the game isn't perfect, but I hope you enjoy it at least a little bit!

Thank you for checking it out 

-Mason :)
